#JELLYFISH 
library(tidyverse)
seq(from=-10, to=10, by = 0.05) %>%
  expand.grid(x=., y=.) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=(x^2+pi*cos(y)^2), y=(y+pi*sin(x)))) +
  geom_point(alpha=.1, shape=20, size=0)+
  theme_void()+
  coord_equal()
#rstats #maths #creativecoding https://t.co/X9pado4JLb

library(tidyverse)
seq(-4,4,by=.012) %>%
  expand.grid(x=., y=.) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=(1-abs(x)-sin(y^2)), y=(1+y-cos(x^2)))) +
  geom_point(alpha=.03, shape=20, size=0)+
  theme_void()+
  coord_polar()
